cn.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

马上就能找到物品的简单管理软件！

整理整顿后找不到东西，是不是很困扰吗？

使用“哪里哪里”就能马上找到要找的东西！


建造房子，制作家具，分配储物柜，把东西全部放进去吧。


书籍和重要的收藏、兴趣的道具、孩子的玩具、季节的衣服、回忆的物品等，有助于整理家里所有的东西。

无论是不能扔东西的人，还是非常喜欢整理整顿东西的人，这都是非常适合的应用程序。

cn.releaseNotes:
- 重磅更新：终于……你现在可以在“日历”标签中添加联系人了！当你的朋友告诉你生日时，你可以立即保存他们的银河签名。只需输入一个名字并保存，他们就会出现在应用的各个部分，展示有意义的关联与同步。
- 更新并优化了信息文本。
cn.description:
这个应用是由1320玛雅历创始人、美国时间法则基金会与中国有时间的生活红月导师三方联合制作出品，让你能够随时随地使用神奇的玛雅历！
“13:20玛雅历让我们更轻易地理解玛雅历，并整合运用到我们的每日生活中。强烈推荐噢！”


玛雅人已经以惊人的精确度描述了，围绕着我们的宇宙与大自然的循环规律。他们创建了与所有这些周期共时和谐的日历。跟随着这些周期可以帮助你与自然建立更深层、更强大的联系，并且更加觉知于自己的本质。

这个App是一个简单的工具，可以帮助我们提升自己的频率，给予我们一个崭新的视角，去洞见我们每一天的、地球的以及宇宙间行星的发生。

- 你有没有意识到，我们的日历（西洋历）不是一个和谐的日历？
- 你知道，月球每年围绕地球运行13（不是12！）圈吗？
- 为什么我们要依据这个不规律的日历生活？
- 你是否对星际知识有兴趣？
- 你知道吗：卓尔金历最紧密地关联了地球上的有机运作与宇宙间天体循环的连结？

- >以上所有，以及更多的，都在这个App中有更详细的解释。 （超过15.000字，共37页）


在新世纪，共时性是一切的基础。



///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
在世界各地有5星的评价！
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
“好玩并带来觉醒”
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 

更多信息：
www.1320sync.com


对于初学者来说，这个App是一个学习工具，因为它包含了对于调性、图腾以及星际玛雅的共时性序列的最基本的知识。刚开始你可能会认为有点难懂，然而很快你将会发现所有一切是如何息息相关的。

“这个App太棒了，可以轻松地操作任何日期。我在家里花了几年时间按照书本上去做的事情，现在可以在几秒钟就可以做到！”

对于已经熟悉玛雅日历这个工具的人来说，这个App就是一个手上导航仪，可以轻松地浏览日期、对任意给出的Kin来计算合Kin等。此外，这个App 可以成为13:20共时历教学者的好帮手，并且它已经广泛使用于世界各地的教学当中了。


=== 功能特色 ===

+ Kin 玛雅历
默认情况下显示当天的Kin。
可以计算任意日期的Kin。

+ Kin 详解
选择13个调性和20个图腾任意组合成Kin。
顶部可以滚动显示4页的解读信息。

+ 合Kin计算器
计算任意组合的kin的加合。你可以添加任意多的人的Kin来计算小组合Kin。

+ 卓尔金历以及银河门户日和波符的提示。

+ 通讯录导入
所有在你通讯录中设置有生日资料的联络人，将会被App自动导入Kin通讯录中，你可以在此查看到你所有联络人的玛雅解读，以及他们与你的关联。

+ 13月亮历法
完全整合的13月亮历法的日历。 （兼作生日日历！）

+ 13:20基础知识信息
这里有很多共时性背后的理论知识，可以帮助你更好地透过玛雅历法获得指引。相关文章均来自www.lawoftime.org美国时间法则官网，并提供有关于时间周期的清晰解释。（超过15.000字，37页）

+ 共享
在3个主要标签页上，你可以分享当下选定的星系印记到你最喜欢的聊天应用中。


＃ 所有知识基于何塞·阿圭列斯博士的著作。
＃ 这个App获得美国时间法则基金会的官方认可，并与他们合作制定 。- www.lawoftime.org
# Ariel Spilsbury.

cn.description:
十年不忘初心，官方正版经典再升级！
原版复刻端游，好玩又保值，永不关服！
布拉格公会强势回归，兄弟我在正版传奇等你！


2024官方正版传奇今日盛大首发！原版PC游戏内容1:1复刻重制，经典全职业-道法战回归。多系统复古玩法，游戏中多种复古写实场景可供玩家随意切换，多种酷炫魔幻的守护装备可在怪物中爆落。自由打金兄弟齐聚，燃情沙城争霸！

【游戏玩法】
— PK爆装 跨服竞技
自由PK，蛮荒古城，跨服争霸，多人竞技，与其他服抢夺资源，争夺BOSS！
杀人爆装、野外红名、镖车护送、领地争夺、激情攻沙丰富的PvP玩法！
— 轻松挂机 装备保值 
护肝玩法，轻松挂机升级，等级永不落后！
装备道具直接掉落，稀世装备永久保值！
— 自由交易 散人天堂
超激情打宝神器，爆极品装备、绚丽法阵高级技能刷怪！
装备保值自由交易，打造散人天堂！
— 新增玩法 激爽一夏
卧龙山庄勇闯天关，BOSS悬赏皇陵秘境，刀刀屠龙刀刀切割！

【特色系统】
— 副本系统：
全新副本，重磅来袭，等着玩家去探索和体验，和兄弟一起并肩作战吧！
— 装备系统：
装备可通过洗练获得随机属性；武器、衣服、项链、勋章、手镯、戒指、腰带、鞋子、玉佩、疗伤石等装备可通过镶嵌宝石提升装备属性。装备阶数：沃玛、祖玛、赤月、雷霆、战神、火龙、通云、金牛、主宰、传奇、热血、真龙、神龙、GM系列，可通过镶嵌宝石提高属性。
— 转生系统：
自由转生，转生神翼，万人膜拜，可增加角色生命值和攻击穿戴更高等级装备进入更高等级地图。
— 法觉系统：
炫酷法阵必不可少，增强法阵属性，轻松过渡前中期，法阵专属外观，让你在万人面前闪闪发光。
— 封号系统：
消耗功勋可提升封号等级，升级后可获得大量属性加成和封号称号显示。

cn.releaseNotes: 在此版本中，我们修复了通过链接搜索 YouTube 视频的问题。
cn.description:
你是否厌倦了 YouTube 视频中的广告打扰

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 视频浏览器将屏蔽观看视频时出现的所有侵入式广告 让你可以流畅无阻地享受喜爱的视频

此外 我们的应用还提供你会喜欢的功能

• 画中画播放 在使用其他应用时观看 YouTube 视频
• 仅音频模式 在锁屏状态下播放任何 YouTube 视频的音频
• 自动关闭 设置睡眠定时器 Premium
• 循环模式 自动重复播放你最喜欢的视频 Premium
• 学习模式 通过字幕学习语言 Premium

此外 还包括播放列表 速度调整 相关视频 AirPlay 等实用功能 让你的观影体验更上一层楼

如何使用 PlayNav

画中画播放 PIP (Premium)

在使用其他应用时观看 YouTube 视频 启用后播放器会缩小到屏幕上 你可以随意移动或双击隐藏它

如何启用
1 播放视频时 点击左上角的 PIP 图标 两个小屏幕图标
2 视频播放时 从 iPhone 底部向上滑动 播放器将出现在屏幕上

仅音频模式

在 iPhone 屏幕锁定的情况下 收听你最喜欢的 YouTube 视频音频 可用于运动 散步 或睡前 搭配自动关闭功能 让你放松聆听喜爱的视频

如何启用
1 启用画中画播放
2 然后锁定 iPhone 音频将继续播放

自动关闭

睡觉时间 到 YouTube 选择你喜欢的视频或播放列表 设置自动关闭计时器 让你在喜爱的音频陪伴下入睡

如何启用
1 在播放器中点击睡眠图标 月亮
2 选择自动关闭的时间
3 可与仅音频模式结合使用

循环模式 重复播放视频

想让你的视频循环播放 启用循环模式 让视频无限循环播放 还可与仅音频模式结合使用

如何启用
1 点击循环图标 视频将持续循环播放 直到你手动关闭

学习模式 通过字幕学习语言

现在 你可以通过字幕学习语言 启用学习模式后 你将看到原始字幕和你的语言翻译 还可以调整播放速度 更好地理解每个单词

如何启用
1 搜索你学习语言的视频
2 视频播放后 点击标题旁的学习模式按钮

– 现在试用 PLAYNAV！–

免费享受所有基础功能，并通过一次性购买解锁 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的网络连接

相关关键词
YouTube YouTube Music YouTube Vanced 广告拦截器 无需订阅 跳过 YouTube 广告 无广告音乐 屏蔽弹窗 YouTube AdBlocker 拦截弹窗广告 无广告内容 高级广告拦截器 AdBlock Plus 删除广告 无广告 YouTube

需要帮助
访问 playnav.vidiom.app 或联系我们 info@playnav.vidiom.app

服务条款 playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service
隐私政策 playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Dumb Phone 是一款极简的应用程序启动器，旨在通过保持主屏幕整洁、无通知来帮助你减少屏幕使用时间。

Dumb Phone 可完全自定义，让你选择对你来说最重要的应用程序，并以简单、简约的界面显示在主屏幕上。

无论你喜欢暗模式还是亮模式，这款启动器都能很好地与这两种模式配合使用，让你选择最适合自己的视图。

使用 Dumb Phone，保持专注，简化你的数字生活。

hk.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

hk.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？

hk.description:
This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." 

The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence.

This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events.

- Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? 
- Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? 
- Why do we live with this irregular calendar?
- Are you interested in Astrology?

-> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm.


///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
5 star rating across the world! 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
"Entertaining as well as enlightening" 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 

MORE INFO: 
www.1320sync.com 


For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. 

"This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds."

For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world.


=== FEATURES ===

+ Kin Calendar
This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date.

+ Personal Notes
On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes.

+ Kin Picker
Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information.

+ Combined Kin Calculator 
Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. 

+ Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly.

+ Contact Import 
All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. 

+ 13 Moon Calendar 
Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) 

+ 13:20 Information 
Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

+ Sharing
On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. 


# Based on the work of José Argüelles.
# This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, 
# Ariel Spilsbury.

hk.description:
THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - It’s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? There’s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin!

•        A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, that’s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime!

•        A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: “was it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Room”, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers!

•        CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Don’t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery.

•        FAMILY FRIENDLY - It’s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases it’s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery!

•        SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion!

•        ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out who’s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Don’t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are!

•        10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detective’s Package. Listed under “Editor’s Choice” for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. 
o        Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination!
o        Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime?
o        Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids!
o        Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale?
o        Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel!
o        Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London!
o        Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep?
o        Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! It’s a luxury race to the answer!
o        Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface!
o        Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Black’s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth!


About Marmalade Game Studio
At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. Play our classic games, including Monopoly and The Game of Life 2, anywhere on your mobile! Enjoy with your friends and family whether you’re together or apart. You can find the fun with people you know or players around the world. Our games are ad-free, family friendly fun. For quality time, look for the Marmalade Game Studio logo.

hk.description:
你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的網路連接

相關關鍵詞
YouTube、YouTube Music、YouTube Vanced、廣告攔截器、無需訂閱、跳過 YouTube 廣告、無廣告音樂、屏蔽彈窗、YouTube 的 AdBlock、屏蔽彈窗廣告、無廣告內容、高級廣告攔截器、AdBlock Plus、移除廣告、無廣告 YouTube

需要幫助
訪問 playnav.vidiom.app 或聯繫我們 info@playnav.vidiom.app

hk.trackName: Forest 專注森林 - 讀書專注番茄鐘
hk.releaseNotes: 森林巡邏員發現了一些臭蟲，並用超能力收拾乾淨了，快來森林看看吧！
hk.description:
## 136 國家中排名第一名的生產力工具 app；超過兩百萬付費用戶的專注神器
## 我們的用戶在世界各地種下超過 1,500,000 棵真樹
## 簡單有趣的方式幫助您保持專注，培養高效率的生活習慣
    
紐約時報：「如果你想要放下手機、專注當下，真誠地和你的家人朋友們渡過相聚的時光，Forest 是你的最佳選擇。」
    
數位時代：「好的習慣必須要一段時間養成，要改善低頭族、不時會滑手機的症狀也不是一天兩天，記得多多使用這款App來幫助你改掉壞習慣，重新找回專注的自己。」
    
不論你是在圖書館讀書或是在辦公室上班，每當你希望有一段專心工作或學習的時間，你可以在 Forest 中種下一顆種子。在接下來的時間內，這顆種子將會慢慢地成長為一棵大樹。若是你禁不起誘惑，在這段時間內離開這個 app，你充滿生機、可愛的小樹將會枯萎而死。每一天，你都會有一片森林種滿了你今天所有茁壯的大樹，每一棵樹都代表了你曾經努力的時光。伴隨著畫面中生長的小樹，成就感以及責任感將會幫助你暫時離開手機，全心投入到手邊的工作，建立高效率與專注的生活習慣。 #治療拖延症 #提升時間效率 #遇見心流 #戒除手機成癮
    
保持專注，拒當低頭族！
    
保持專注：
• 基於番茄工作法（番茄鐘）把時間抓回自己手中
• 種植漂亮的小樹，並專注於生活中更重要的事情上
• 因應不同專注情境，自訂你的應用程式允許名單，種樹時名單外的 App 將會被屏蔽（iOS 16 以上）
• 用你專注的時光，一點一滴茁壯你的森林
    
滿滿的成就感：
• 和朋友們分享你的成果並與全世界的使用者一同競賽
• 用專注的時光累積 Forest 金幣，解鎖超過 90 種精心設計的大樹、灌木及背景白噪音
• 與家人、好友一起，開始一局種樹挑戰
• 達成成就獲得額外獎勵
• 在保持專心的同時，與 Trees for the Future 一起為世界種下真正的樹苗
    
歷史回顧：
• 自定義任務標籤，讓你花在各個任務的時間分配一目瞭然，幫助助你自主時間管理
• 回顧你一週、一個月甚至一整年累積的大森林
• 可追蹤你每日的手機使用時數與頻率
• 以時間軸的形式回顧你在 Forest 經歷的專注旅程
• 將你的專心時間記錄在蘋果健康 App
    
現在就放下手機，種出專屬自己的專注森林！
    
注意事項：
• Forest 是一個 iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch 通用的應用程式，買一次即可在不同 iOS 設備上使用。於 iPhone, iPad 能使用上述提及的完整功能，於 Apple Watch 可提供查看今日專注紀錄以及顯示即時專注狀態。若要下載/解鎖其他非 iOS 平台的版本需要另外購買，不過只要登入同一個 Forest 帳號，你的帳號資料便可以在不同平台的設備間同步。
• 由於 iOS 系統限制，允許名單功能需要 iOS/iPadOS 16 以上才能使用。iOS/iPadOS 15 以下的裝置無法使用允許名單，在種樹時離開 Forest 會導致小樹枯萎。
 • 種植真樹功能因為預算限制，每個帳號最多只能兌換五棵真樹。除此之外，我們時常會有一些限時活動可以種植更多的真樹，請記得關注我們的社交平台訊息，或是 app 內部通知。
 • Forest 在 App Store 上僅有此唯一版本，其他雷同或是刻意假冒 Forest 的軟體皆不是本團隊開發的產品，感謝您對於原創者的支持！
    
你可以在這些社群平台找到我們：：
在 Facebook 給我們個讚: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
在 Twitter 跟隨我們: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
在 Instagram 追蹤我們: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/
    
我們還有提供瀏覽器的擴充套件，立即前往 www.forestapp.cc 查看吧！
    
- 音效設計 : Shi Kuang Lee

Dumb Phone 是一款簡約的應用程式啟動器，旨在讓您的主螢幕保持乾淨，沒有任何通知，從而幫助您減少使用螢幕的時間。

Dumb Phone 可完全自訂，讓您選擇對您最重要的應用程式，並以簡單、簡約的介面顯示在主螢幕上。

無論您喜歡深色或淺色模式，這款啟動器都能很好地配合，讓您選擇最適合自己的檢視方式。

使用 Dumb Phone，保持專注，簡化您的數位生活。

hk.description:
召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.releaseNotes:
迎戰蜘蛛女王和她的信徒吧！

- 3個讓人毛骨悚然的全新關卡
- 1場很多隻腳的BOSS戰
- 7種爬行可怖的全新敵人
- 1座利尼維亞的新防禦塔
- 1位黑暗大軍的全新英雄
- 5項讓人背脊發寒的成就
hk.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？


--------
Ironhide的服務條款：https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService
Ironhide隱私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧

hk.releaseNotes:
性能優化。
新增英雄【猿神】悟空
hk.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

mo.releaseNotes:
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
- Added support for iPhone 16
mo.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。

mo.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

mo.description:
THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - It’s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? There’s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin!

•        A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, that’s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime!

•        A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: “was it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Room”, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers!

•        CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Don’t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery.

•        FAMILY FRIENDLY - It’s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases it’s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery!

•        SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion!

•        ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out who’s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Don’t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are!

•        10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detective’s Package. Listed under “Editor’s Choice” for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. 
o        Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination!
o        Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime?
o        Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids!
o        Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale?
o        Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel!
o        Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London!
o        Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep?
o        Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! It’s a luxury race to the answer!
o        Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface!
o        Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Black’s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth!


About Marmalade Game Studio
At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. Play our classic games, including Monopoly and The Game of Life 2, anywhere on your mobile! Enjoy with your friends and family whether you’re together or apart. You can find the fun with people you know or players around the world. Our games are ad-free, family friendly fun. For quality time, look for the Marmalade Game Studio logo.

mo.description:
This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." 

The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence.

This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events.

- Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? 
- Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? 
- Why do we live with this irregular calendar?
- Are you interested in Astrology?

-> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm.


///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
5 star rating across the world! 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
"Entertaining as well as enlightening" 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 

MORE INFO: 
www.1320sync.com 


For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. 

"This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds."

For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world.


=== FEATURES ===

+ Kin Calendar
This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date.

+ Personal Notes
On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes.

+ Kin Picker
Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information.

+ Combined Kin Calculator 
Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. 

+ Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly.

+ Contact Import 
All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. 

+ 13 Moon Calendar 
Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) 

+ 13:20 Information 
Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

+ Sharing
On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. 


# Based on the work of José Argüelles.
# This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, 
# Ariel Spilsbury.

mo.releaseNotes: 森林巡邏員發現了一些臭蟲，並用超能力收拾乾淨了，快來森林看看吧！
mo.description:
## 136 國家中排名第一名的生產力工具 app；超過兩百萬付費用戶的專注神器
## 我們的用戶在世界各地種下超過 1,500,000 棵真樹
## 簡單有趣的方式幫助您保持專注，培養高效率的生活習慣
    
紐約時報：「如果你想要放下手機、專注當下，真誠地和你的家人朋友們渡過相聚的時光，Forest 是你的最佳選擇。」
    
數位時代：「好的習慣必須要一段時間養成，要改善低頭族、不時會滑手機的症狀也不是一天兩天，記得多多使用這款App來幫助你改掉壞習慣，重新找回專注的自己。」
    
不論你是在圖書館讀書或是在辦公室上班，每當你希望有一段專心工作或學習的時間，你可以在 Forest 中種下一顆種子。在接下來的時間內，這顆種子將會慢慢地成長為一棵大樹。若是你禁不起誘惑，在這段時間內離開這個 app，你充滿生機、可愛的小樹將會枯萎而死。每一天，你都會有一片森林種滿了你今天所有茁壯的大樹，每一棵樹都代表了你曾經努力的時光。伴隨著畫面中生長的小樹，成就感以及責任感將會幫助你暫時離開手機，全心投入到手邊的工作，建立高效率與專注的生活習慣。 #治療拖延症 #提升時間效率 #遇見心流 #戒除手機成癮
    
保持專注，拒當低頭族！
    
保持專注：
• 基於番茄工作法（番茄鐘）把時間抓回自己手中
• 種植漂亮的小樹，並專注於生活中更重要的事情上
• 因應不同專注情境，自訂你的應用程式允許名單，種樹時名單外的 App 將會被屏蔽（iOS 16 以上）
• 用你專注的時光，一點一滴茁壯你的森林
    
滿滿的成就感：
• 和朋友們分享你的成果並與全世界的使用者一同競賽
• 用專注的時光累積 Forest 金幣，解鎖超過 90 種精心設計的大樹、灌木及背景白噪音
• 與家人、好友一起，開始一局種樹挑戰
• 達成成就獲得額外獎勵
• 在保持專心的同時，與 Trees for the Future 一起為世界種下真正的樹苗
    
歷史回顧：
• 自定義任務標籤，讓你花在各個任務的時間分配一目瞭然，幫助助你自主時間管理
• 回顧你一週、一個月甚至一整年累積的大森林
• 可追蹤你每日的手機使用時數與頻率
• 以時間軸的形式回顧你在 Forest 經歷的專注旅程
• 將你的專心時間記錄在蘋果健康 App
    
現在就放下手機，種出專屬自己的專注森林！
    
注意事項：
• Forest 是一個 iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch 通用的應用程式，買一次即可在不同 iOS 設備上使用。於 iPhone, iPad 能使用上述提及的完整功能，於 Apple Watch 可提供查看今日專注紀錄以及顯示即時專注狀態。若要下載/解鎖其他非 iOS 平台的版本需要另外購買，不過只要登入同一個 Forest 帳號，你的帳號資料便可以在不同平台的設備間同步。
• 由於 iOS 系統限制，允許名單功能需要 iOS/iPadOS 16 以上才能使用。iOS/iPadOS 15 以下的裝置無法使用允許名單，在種樹時離開 Forest 會導致小樹枯萎。
 • 種植真樹功能因為預算限制，每個帳號最多只能兌換五棵真樹。除此之外，我們時常會有一些限時活動可以種植更多的真樹，請記得關注我們的社交平台訊息，或是 app 內部通知。
 • Forest 在 App Store 上僅有此唯一版本，其他雷同或是刻意假冒 Forest 的軟體皆不是本團隊開發的產品，感謝您對於原創者的支持！
    
你可以在這些社群平台找到我們：：
在 Facebook 給我們個讚: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
在 Twitter 跟隨我們: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
在 Instagram 追蹤我們: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/
    
我們還有提供瀏覽器的擴充套件，立即前往 www.forestapp.cc 查看吧！
    
- 音效設計 : Shi Kuang Lee

mo.description:
Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent.

RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea.

Base Application
-NEW Warning Display Dialog
-NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity
-MRMS Reflectivity
-Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data
-30 Frames of Data
-7 Day Radar History
-Lightning Detection/Animation
-24 Hour Storm Reports
-SPC Convective Outlooks & Watches
-NHC Tropical Suite & Hurricane Hunter
-WPC Excessive Rainfall Outlooks
-Mesoscale Discussions (Severe, Winter, & Precip.)
-CPC Temp. & Precip. Outlooks
-Fire Weather Outlooks & Drought Monitor
-WPC Winter Forecasts & WSSI
-METARS
-Real-Time NWS Storm-Based Warnings
-Non-Precip Watches/Warnings for USA
-Flash Animation & In-App Sound Alert for All Alerts
-WPC Surface Analysis
-Buoy Data & Tide Forecasts
-NEXRAD Hail History
-Spotter Network Locations
-Power Outage Layer
-Map Type Customization
-Detailed City & Road Network
-15 Custom Locations with a Linked RadarOmega Account
-Drawing, Data Viewer, & Distance Tools
-Storm Track Drawing Tool
-Share Screenshot & Video
-Push Notifications for All Storm-Based Watches/Warnings Using GPS Location
-Access to cyclonePORT Network

Gamma
-Hi-Res Satellite Data
-Lightning Detection/Animation, METARS, & GLM for Mesoscale & Storm-Based Satellite Sectors
-National Digital Forecast Database
-Access to Project MesoVort
-75 Frames of Data
-Dual View Radar with 30 Frames
-Smoothing for Radar/Satellite
-30 Day Radar History
-6 Month Storm Report Archive
-3D Radar/Satellite
-Upload 3 Custom Color Tables
-30 Custom Locations with Icon Upload
-2 Custom Location Lists
-Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts Using GPS Location ONLY (max of 8 at a time)

Beta
*Everything in Gamma PLUS*
-MRMS Data
-150 Frames of Data
-Dual View Radar/Satellite with 50 Frames
-Smoothing for MRMS
-90 Day Radar History
-5 Year Storm Report Archive
-3D MRMS
-Upload 8 Custom Color Tables
-75 Custom Locations with Icon Upload
-5 Custom Location Lists

Alpha
*Everything in Beta PLUS*
-Volumetric Radar
-Model Data with Contours for HRRR, NAM3KM, NAM12KM, RAP, GFS, ECMWF, HWRF, & HMON
-250 Frames of Data
-Dual View Radar/Satellite with 100 Frames
-Quad View Radar/Satellite on iPad & Desktop with 50 Frames
-Smoothing for Models
-90 Day Radar History
-10 Year Storm Report Archive
-Upload 30 Custom Color Tables
-150 Custom Locations with Icon Upload
-10 Custom Location Lists
-1 Site Lightning Monitoring with Custom Range Zones
-Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts for up to 3 Custom Locations and GPS Locations (max of 8 at a time)

Additional Add-Ons
-Rapid Sweep

Subscriptions are maintained through the iOS App Store. We will work with our customers however, refunds must be done through the iOS App Store. Please be sure to reach out to our support team if you have any problems, questions, or concerns.

For Support- You can create a ticket and we will resolve it as soon as possible:
https://radaromegawx.supportbee.io/portal/sign_in

See our Terms of Service below:
https://www.radaromega.com/terms.php

RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea.

Gamma

tw.description:
LUCH Films是一款現代應用程序，用於為圖像賦予膠片攝影效果。嘗試獨特的散景效果，漏光，噪音和灰塵效果以及原始濾鏡。

20多個手提濾網

該應用程序有20多種由專業攝影師手工製作的濾鏡。它們是通用的，可模仿各種膠片和柯達和ILFORD製成，用於各種照片和色彩。

內幕故事和進給的膠片框架

我們已經將膠卷框架調整為適合現代屏幕格式，並將其添加到應用程序中，以使膠卷攝影的熱情永遠存在於我們的心靈中。

除塵效果

製作破舊的照片很容易。您不必等待20年，只需選擇35種效果之一。

漏光

您知道我們喜歡小時候看過的這些舊的漏光鏡頭。我們在LUCH FILMS中模擬了相同的閃光。

效果

如果您像我們一樣熱愛散景，那麼您絕對應該喜歡它。從35種散景和棱鏡效果中進行選擇。

沒有廣告，沒有訂閱，沒有應用內購買

完全控制您的圖像，應用與攝影師合作開發的獨特濾鏡。創建獨特的照片，包括新圖層。超過90種效果。可以對圖像應用噪點和灰塵效果，漏光，散景和棱鏡效果。

您可以為信息流或故事選擇圖像的大小，這是Instagram或其他社交網絡的理想選擇。膠卷相框也包括在LUCH膠卷中。

在Instagram上關注@luchfilmsapp，以從我們的用戶社區中汲取靈感。
我們喜歡聽到您的想法和反饋。請給我發電子郵件hello@vostokapp.ru或在Instagram上通過DM @@ luchfilmsapp向我們發送問題或建議。

tw.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search!

Do you have trouble Looking for items?

Find your item quickly with "where I put it”!

Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings.

Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

tw.releaseNotes:
迎戰蜘蛛女王和她的信徒吧！

- 3個讓人毛骨悚然的全新關卡
- 1場很多隻腳的BOSS戰

tw.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？


--------
Ironhide的服務條款：https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService
Ironhide隱私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

tw.releaseNotes:
- A big Finally … You can now add contacts in the Calendar tab! When your friend tells you their birth date, you can instantly save their Galactic Signature. Just give it a name and save — it will now appear throughout the app, showing meaningful connections and synchronicities.
- Updated and improved info texts.
tw.description:
This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." 

The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence.

This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events.

- Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? 
- Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? 
- Why do we live with this irregular calendar?
- Are you interested in Astrology?

-> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm.


///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
5 star rating across the world! 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
"Entertaining as well as enlightening" 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 

MORE INFO: 
www.1320sync.com 


For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. 

"This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds."

For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world.


=== FEATURES ===

+ Kin Calendar
This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date.

+ Personal Notes
On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes.

+ Kin Picker
Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information.

+ Combined Kin Calculator 
Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. 

+ Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly.

+ Contact Import 
All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. 

+ 13 Moon Calendar 
Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) 

+ 13:20 Information 
Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

+ Sharing
On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. 


# Based on the work of José Argüelles.
# This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, 
# Ariel Spilsbury.

tw.releaseNotes: 在此版本中，我們修復了透過連結搜尋 YouTube 影片的問題。
tw.description:
你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的網路連接

tw.trackName: Forest 專注森林 - 讀書專注番茄鐘
tw.releaseNotes: 森林巡邏員發現了一些臭蟲，並用超能力收拾乾淨了，快來森林看看吧！
tw.description:
## 136 國家中排名第一名的生產力工具 app；超過兩百萬付費用戶的專注神器
## 我們的用戶在世界各地種下超過 1,500,000 棵真樹
## 簡單有趣的方式幫助您保持專注，培養高效率的生活習慣
    
紐約時報：「如果你想要放下手機、專注當下，真誠地和你的家人朋友們渡過相聚的時光，Forest 是你的最佳選擇。」
    
數位時代：「好的習慣必須要一段時間養成，要改善低頭族、不時會滑手機的症狀也不是一天兩天，記得多多使用這款App來幫助你改掉壞習慣，重新找回專注的自己。」
    
不論你是在圖書館讀書或是在辦公室上班，每當你希望有一段專心工作或學習的時間，你可以在 Forest 中種下一顆種子。在接下來的時間內，這顆種子將會慢慢地成長為一棵大樹。若是你禁不起誘惑，在這段時間內離開這個 app，你充滿生機、可愛的小樹將會枯萎而死。每一天，你都會有一片森林種滿了你今天所有茁壯的大樹，每一棵樹都代表了你曾經努力的時光。伴隨著畫面中生長的小樹，成就感以及責任感將會幫助你暫時離開手機，全心投入到手邊的工作，建立高效率與專注的生活習慣。 #治療拖延症 #提升時間效率 #遇見心流 #戒除手機成癮
    
保持專注，拒當低頭族！
    
保持專注：
• 基於番茄工作法（番茄鐘）把時間抓回自己手中
• 種植漂亮的小樹，並專注於生活中更重要的事情上
• 因應不同專注情境，自訂你的應用程式允許名單，種樹時名單外的 App 將會被屏蔽（iOS 16 以上）
• 用你專注的時光，一點一滴茁壯你的森林
    
滿滿的成就感：
• 和朋友們分享你的成果並與全世界的使用者一同競賽
• 用專注的時光累積 Forest 金幣，解鎖超過 90 種精心設計的大樹、灌木及背景白噪音
• 與家人、好友一起，開始一局種樹挑戰
• 達成成就獲得額外獎勵
• 在保持專心的同時，與 Trees for the Future 一起為世界種下真正的樹苗
    
歷史回顧：
• 自定義任務標籤，讓你花在各個任務的時間分配一目瞭然，幫助助你自主時間管理
• 回顧你一週、一個月甚至一整年累積的大森林
• 可追蹤你每日的手機使用時數與頻率
• 以時間軸的形式回顧你在 Forest 經歷的專注旅程
• 將你的專心時間記錄在蘋果健康 App
    
現在就放下手機，種出專屬自己的專注森林！
    
注意事項：
• Forest 是一個 iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch 通用的應用程式，買一次即可在不同 iOS 設備上使用。於 iPhone, iPad 能使用上述提及的完整功能，於 Apple Watch 可提供查看今日專注紀錄以及顯示即時專注狀態。若要下載/解鎖其他非 iOS 平台的版本需要另外購買，不過只要登入同一個 Forest 帳號，你的帳號資料便可以在不同平台的設備間同步。
• 由於 iOS 系統限制，允許名單功能需要 iOS/iPadOS 16 以上才能使用。iOS/iPadOS 15 以下的裝置無法使用允許名單，在種樹時離開 Forest 會導致小樹枯萎。
 • 種植真樹功能因為預算限制，每個帳號最多只能兌換五棵真樹。除此之外，我們時常會有一些限時活動可以種植更多的真樹，請記得關注我們的社交平台訊息，或是 app 內部通知。
 • Forest 在 App Store 上僅有此唯一版本，其他雷同或是刻意假冒 Forest 的軟體皆不是本團隊開發的產品，感謝您對於原創者的支持！
    
你可以在這些社群平台找到我們：：
在 Facebook 給我們個讚: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
在 Twitter 跟隨我們: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
在 Instagram 追蹤我們: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/
    
我們還有提供瀏覽器的擴充套件，立即前往 www.forestapp.cc 查看吧！
    
- 音效設計 : Shi Kuang Lee

Dumb Phone 可完全自訂，讓您選擇對您最重要的應用程式，並以簡單、簡約的介面顯示在主螢幕上。

無論您喜歡深色或淺色模式，這款啟動器都能很好地配合，讓您選擇最適合自己的檢視方式。

使用 Dumb Phone，保持專注，簡化您的數位生活。

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
迎戰蜘蛛女王和她的信徒吧！

- 3個讓人毛骨悚然的全新關卡
- 1場很多隻腳的BOSS戰
- 7種爬行可怖的全新敵人
- 1座利尼維亞的新防禦塔
- 1位黑暗大軍的全新英雄
- 5項讓人背脊發寒的成就
tw.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？


--------
Ironhide的服務條款：https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService
Ironhide隱私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.description:
召集傳說英雄，挑戰無盡關卡！
自動戰鬥、採礦、強化通通都有！
真正的放置型奇幻 RPG，即使離線也能持續成長！

* 組建擁有獨特技能的英雄戰隊，發揮戰略優勢！

* 利用礦坑系統收集資源！打造裝備所需的一切盡在其中！

* 挑戰強大的首領，獲得傳說級獎勵！

* 自動成長系統，讓忙碌的你也能輕鬆遊玩！

* 多樣化內容：地城、遺物、進化、傳說裝備等你來體驗！

立即下載，開始書寫屬於你的傳奇！
馬上開始遊戲，收集你的英雄吧！

us.releaseNotes:
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
- Added support for iPhone 16
us.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

us.description:
● Game overview
Following on from the Aladdin X projector and Nintendo Switch versions, as the third step, we have now officially released a smartphone version.
The rules are simple. It's a game where you combine two small fruits to make a bigger one and work towards making a watermelon. You must be careful that the fruits do not overflow from the box as you keep scoring points and aim to get a high score. When two fruits of the same type hit each other, the fruit type “evolves.” Then, when you hit two watermelons against each other...!? 
The ranking is updated every day! Have fun aiming for the top ranking!

● How to play the game
1. When fruits of the same type hit each other, they “evolve” into the next size of fruit and the score increases.
2. Use your finger to move Poppy to the left and right and then take your finger off the screen to drop the fruit. You can also tap anywhere in the box to drop the fruit to that specific location.
3. The game ends if the fruit overflows from the box.

● Notice
Official information on the Suika Game is available here.
Official Suika Game Website: https://suikagame.jp/

Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap.

AUDIO-ONLY MODE

Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos!

AUTO SHUTDOWN

Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep.

1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player.

LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE)

us.description:
This app puts the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar in your pocket! "13:20:Sync makes it so much easier to understand and integrate the calendar into every day life. Highly recommend it." 

The Mayan People have described, in breathtaking precision, the cycles of both the universe and nature around us. They created a harmonic calendar that is synchronized to all those cycles. Following these cycles can help you get a stronger connection with nature around you and become conscious of your essence.

This app provides a simple way to sync along those cycles, to raise our frequency and give us a new lens to view both our day-to-day and planetary events.

- Did you ever realize that our (Gregorian) calendar is not a harmonic calendar? 
- Did you know that the moon has 13 (not 12!) orbits around the earth in 1 year? 
- Why do we live with this irregular calendar?
- Are you interested in Astrology?

-> All this, and more, is explained carefully in this app. (over 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

In the New Time, synchronicity is the norm.


///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
5 star rating across the world! 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 
"Entertaining as well as enlightening" 
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 

MORE INFO: 
www.1320sync.com 


For the beginner this app is a learning tool because it contains an extensive explanation about Tones and Seals and the synchronizing order of the Mayan Astrology. You may think it's difficult at first but soon you will feel how it all connects. 

"This app is great, and allows easy manipulation of dates. I spent years in books doing in hours what I can now do in seconds."

For the ones who are already familiar with the Mayan Calendar this app is a handy tool to navigate the cycles, and calculate the Combined Kin for any given combination. Furthermore this app can be of great assistance to teach other people about the 13:20 cycles and is used in teachings around the world.


=== FEATURES ===

+ Kin Calendar
This is your main Mayan Dreamspell Calendar Dashboard with all the details you need to stay in sync. Shows the Kin of today by default, and you can calculate the Kin for any other date.

+ Personal Notes
On this new page you can keep your personal notes for the 2 main cycles of time: the Tzolkin cycle of 260 days and the 13 Moon cycle of 365 days. And with the powerful text search function you quickly find your notes.

+ Kin Picker
Select any combination of the 13 Tones and 20 Seals. Top section can scroll to 4 pages with information.

+ Combined Kin Calculator 
Calculate the Combined Kin of any combination of Kin. You can add as many Kin as you like to calculate the Combined Kin for a group of people. 

+ Tzolkin with indication of the GAP day's and Wavespell and more. Tap and hold to select a Kin number directly.

+ Contact Import 
All contacts in your Contacts App will be automatically imported and assigned to the correct Kin. See all your contacts with their Mayan Reading and how you relate to them. 

+ 13 Moon Calendar 
Full integration of 13 Moon Calendar. (doubles as a birthday calendar!) 

+ 13:20 Information 
Lots of information about the theory behind synchronization to help you navigate the Mayan Dreamspell Calendar. The texts provide a clear explanation of the Cycles of Time. (More than 15.000 words on 37 pages) Please note that these text are in English language only.

+ Sharing
On all the 3 main tabs you can share the current selected Galactic Signature using your favorite app. 


# Based on the work of José Argüelles.
# This app was made with permission of and in cooperation with the Foundation for the Law of Time - www.lawoftime.org, 
# Ariel Spilsbury.

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

tr.description:
LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters.

20+ HANDMADE FILTERS

The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD.

FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED

We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds.

DUST EFFECT

Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects.

LIGHT LEAKS

You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS.

BOKEH EFFECT

If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects.

NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES

Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image.

You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films.

Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users.
We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

tr.description:
Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together.

Benefits of Premium version:
- Unique pet Raven
- Starter Kit
- Caches of useful items in shelters
- Expanded selection of perks
- Chat without any limitations
- Reduced waiting time between parcels
- Access to all kinds and colors of map markers

Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. 

It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. 

- Hardcore survival:
Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax.

- Realistic world:
The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness!

- A lot of opportunities:
Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition.

- People and stories:
Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world.

- Improve your skills:
Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others.

- Cooperative mode:
The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game.

Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials.
Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! 

Features: 
- Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! 
- Hardcore simulator of survival 
- Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode 
- Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online
War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.

User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en
